Posts.Content: Mar 3, 2009 05:36PM anewday wrote: How're you feeling now? My staples came out yesterday & now the surgical dressing's off , I can see my chest & armpit look all streaky red & puffy. No big pain but is this normal??? I hate being paranoid ...
Posts.Title: self diagnosis.......seroma skippyrcis rferraris

Posts.Content: Mar 3, 2009 08:02PM - edited Mar 3, 2009 08:03PM by anewday My follow-up with the surgeon is Mar 9th but am thinking I'll go in sooner just for some peace of mind. I had a hematoma removed after the mastectomy ( not fun ) and while this feels a bit different, I'll feel better getting it checked out. I'm so glad I found you folks! It's so much easier talking to others going through this ... :-)
